artist: Artist: Taguchi Beisaku; Publisher: Inoue Kichijirō
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban triptych; triptych forming a single image; battle scene; body of water with crashing waves on left, with ships in the distance; raised, waving flag in center image, yellow, with red dragon and red sun (?) depicted on flag; soldiers shooting rifles in center image; plumes of white and gray smoke at top of center image; marching soldiers carrying rifles on right, with one soldier riding in a horse-drawn cart
inscription: on left sheet, on back, in LRC, in pencil: 17-vo (56/13) RE
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Picture of Fleeing Qing Soldiers at Asan
